question: A parallel plate capacitor of capacitance <katex>$C_{1}$</katex> with a dielectric slab in between its plates is connected to a battery. It has a potential difference across its plates. explanation: Since the battery remains connected, potential difference remains constant (<katex>$V_1 = V_2$</katex>). Removing the dielectric decreases capacitance (<katex>$C_1 > C_2$</katex>).
